title: Prepping the Chicken Coop for Winter ~ FAIL

tasks.task: Preparing the chicken coop for winter.
subtasks: Pick out and arrange chicken wire for the chicken run.
Choose the appropriate side of the tarp to face the sun for heating.
Consider alternative solutions if the desired tarp length is not available.
Feed the chickens and prompt them to scratch and peck at their feed.
Move Icelandic chickens to the winter chicken coop.
Give the pigs warm water and fresh hay.
Ensure the pigs have adequate bedding and food.
Manage time constraints and prioritize tasks despite challenges.
Enjoy the benefits of preparedness, such as fresh smoked bacon.

tasks.task: Preparing the Chicken Coop for Winter**
